comments.author: Naomi
comments.content: Wow, great pictures! Thanks so much for the write up.

comments.author: Tony
comments.content: aren't Vietnamese restaurants AMAZING?  You definitely just gave me a great idea for dinner tomorrow night.  I love lemongrass tofu!

comments.author: Marissa
comments.content: I will have to try jasmine...my current favorite Vietnamese place is Green Leaf, and the Vegetarian spring rolls are the best I have ever had...equally so the vegetarian Bun. I crave it. If you haven't tried Green leaf I heartily suggest it, but go early as there is usually a wait.

comments.author: Carmen
comments.content:
I'm dying to know the secret of their vegetarian soy dressing/dipping sauce.  It is so hard to believe that there is no fish sauce in it.

Alternately, does anyone know a good vegetarian substitute for fish sauce?

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: I often improvise a vegetarian replacement for nuoc cham using kombu infused in boiling water to replace the fish sauce, and using all the other standard ingredients... comes out pretty good I think!
